aiExecutiveSummary.overview: Your privacy profile shows elevated risk with consistent high-risk behavior patterns. You've shared sensitive information that reveals geolocation and routines across 145 comments, resulting in an 8.2 average risk score that requires immediate attention.
keyFindings: Geolocation-based PIIs shared 23 times in the last 30 days
Risk score increased 45% since account creation
Peak sharing occurs during evening hours (6-9 PM)
suggestions: Review and edit comments that reveal your daily routines and geolocation data
Set up automatic PII detection alerts
Review privacy settings for support interactions
